div.p:
I work with project teams scattered across the country and the NCR.

GCDOCS makes it a whole lot easier for team members to share files and stay in touch.

More important it helps us ensure we're always on the same page.

GCDOCS keeps our shared files synchronized

so we always know we're working with the latest version

of our team documents—no matter who created it originally or who updated it.

I'm not the most organized person.

Finding documents when I need them used to be a real pain.

GCDOCS has straightened my life.

Its filing system is standardized and centralized.

This makes it really simple to organize everything.

I can easily find and retrieve team documents when I need them.

If there's ever any difficulty, I can rely on GCDOCS' powerful search function.

I like the fact that emails and large documents can be stored and sent as links.

GCDOCS makes it easy to keep everyone up to speed and up to date.

We don't have to keep sending and re-sending huge files every time a document or spreadsheet is revised.

This not only saves space—it saves time and avoids potential confusion.

The great thing about GCDOCS

is that it gives me a public space where I can store the documents that need to be shared and accessed

by my colleagues and others in the department.

GCDOCS also lets me bookmark my important files

my Favourites

so I can quickly access them when I need them.
